QuestData.Title: The Bigger They Are, The Harder They Fel
QuestData.Description: I have had it with these small fry, assistant. Time to go straight to the top.$b$bThe tome is the key! The key to unlocking the potential within our people.$b$bDo not worry, young one. I have enough power to complete the task at hand. Let us harness fel magic and change the future.$b$bFollow me and witness the redemption of the shal'dorei!
QuestData.RewardText: Kyrtos, you old fool! You should have known the risks...
